SELECT NVL(MAX(BROADCAST_NO), 0)+1 FROM BROADCASTS
INSERT INTO BROADCASTS(BROADCAST_NO, BROADCAST_TITLE, START_DATE, BROADCAST_STATUS, CONTENT_CODE, MEMBER_ID, CHANNEL_ID, STREAM_URL) VALUES(#{broadcastNo}, #{broadcastTitle}, SYSDATE, 'e1', #{contentCode}, #{memberId}, #{channelId}, #{streamUrl})
mapper.select:
SELECT B.BROADCAST_NO as "broadcastNo" , B.BROADCAST_TITLE as "broadcastTitle" , B.START_DATE as "startDate" , B.BROADCAST_STATUS as "broadcastStatus" , B.CONTENT_CODE as "contentCode" , B.MEMBER_ID as "memberId" , M.NICK_NAME as "nickName" , B.CHANNEL_ID as "channelId" , B.STREAM_URL as "streamUrl" , M.MEMBER_IMAGE as "memberImage" FROM BROADCASTS B, MEMBERS M WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID
AND BROADCAST_STATUS = 'e1'
AND BROADCAST_STATUS = 'e2'
AND BROADCAST_STATUS = 'e3'
AND BROADCAST_STATUS = 'e4'
